Archiving Tasks¶

Archiving tasks can be done by the task number, by the project, or by a context.

Warning

Archiving tasks will change the numbers of the remaining tasks, so always run a new search after an archive before archiving a second time

CLI Commands¶

These commands are available in the shell

usage: tasker [-h] [-p ...] [-c ...] ...

Positional Arguments¶

tasknum

number of the task to archive

Named Arguments¶

-p, --project

archive by project

Default: []

-c, --context

archive by context

Default: []
